function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low utilization of non-contact elderly care services","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to reliance on in-person services","Mitigation":"Promote and develop non-contact elderly care services to reduce reliance on in-person interactions","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, smart home technology","People":"Elderly individuals, caretakers, community members","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers, technology companies"},{"Description":"Changes in community welfare facilities due to new elderly care model","Impact":"Disruption of existing facility planning and resources","Mitigation":"Update and adapt facility planning to accommodate new elderly care model","Technologies":"Smart facility management systems, IoT devices, remote service delivery","People":"Community administrators, facility managers, planners","Owner":"Community organizations, government, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Rise in non-contact interaction post-COVID-19","Impact":"Community service facilities may not be prepared for increased non-contact interaction","Mitigation":"Enhance online and offline utilization of community service facilities to meet new demand","Technologies":"Digital communication tools, online appointment systems, virtual service delivery platforms","People":"Residents, elderly individuals, community service providers","Owner":"Community organizations, technology companies, service providers"}]}
